title: Tamboril, Ceará
content:
Tamboril, Ceará is a municipality in the state of Ceará in the Northeast region of Brazil.[2][3][4][5] It has an area of about 2046.6 km2, and is located at a latitude of 04º49'56" South and longitude  40º19'14" West, at an altitude of 322 meters.[2]  The estimated population of Tamboril in 2020 was 26,225.[6]

Tamboril contains 8 districts:[3][6]

Tamboril is about 54 kilometers away from the municipality of Crateús, the regional capital of Ceará.[7]

4°49′55″S 40°19′15″W﻿ / ﻿4.83194°S 40.3208°W﻿ / -4.83194; -40.3208
